Name: Brave Hero
About the game: BRAVE HERO is a platformer where the player faces a seemingly simple task to collect all the shards of the crystal. Shards are scattered across tangled levels, where traps lie in wait. Moving platforms will also add complexity to achieving the goal. It takes a lot of dexterity to jump higher. A trampoline will help you to get as high as possible, which will throw the protagonist high enough to catch and push off the wall. The intricate maze will force you to strain your memory to remember where you were and where you were not. This is the only way to find all the parts of the crystal. Chaos has come to the world. To restore order to the world, you need to reunite all parts of the crystal so that order returns to the world. Only a real hero can do it! -Beautiful graphics -Dynamic gameplay -Confused levels
